# jmzqc Use Case Examples

This repository contains example notebooks for the use of the [jmzQC library](https://github.com/MS-Quality-Hub/jmzqc). jmzQC is part of the [MS Quality Hub](https://ms-quality-hub.github.io/). The notebooks demonstrate the calculation of quality control metrics and the generation of mzQC files from proteomics and lipidomics datasets. The notebooks are written in Java and can be run in a Jupyter environment using the Rapaio kernel. Please see the Dockerfile for the required dependencies.

## Running the Example Notebooks
Run the example notebooks on mybinder:

- Example for the calculation of QC metrics and generation of mzQC from a proteomics dataset retrieved from MASSIVE: [![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Proteomics%20mzQC%20Demo-Launch%20Notebook-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/nilshoffmann/jmzqc-usecase/main?urlpath=/lab/workspaces/auto-g/tree/jmzqc_proteomics_demo.ipynb)
- Example for the calculation of QC metrics and generation of mzQC from a lipidomics dataset from MetaboLights: [![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Lipidomics%20/%20SRM%20mzQC%20Demo-Launch%20Notebook-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/nilshoffmann/jmzqc-usecase/main?urlpath=/lab/workspaces/auto-g/tree/jmzqc_lipidomics_demo.ipynb)

## Building the Use Case Java Application

```bash
./mvnw -B package --file pom.xml
```

## Running the Use Case Java Application

```bash
java -jar target/jmzqc-usecase-1.0.0.jar -f 20181113_010_autoQC01.mzML -o proteomics-usecase.mzQC
```

## Building the Use Case Java Application Docker Container

```bash
./mvnw -B jib:dockerBuild --file pom.xml
```

## Runing the Use Case Java Application Docker Container

```bash
docker run -it --volume=$(pwd):/tmp --rm jmzqc-usecase -f /tmp/20181113_010_autoQC01.mzML -o /tmp/proteomics-usecase.mzQC
```

## Building the MyBinder Docker Image

```bash
docker build -t jmzqc-usecase-notebooks .
```

## Running the MyBinder Docker Image

```bash
docker run -p 8888:8888 -v $(pwd):/home/jovyan/work jmzqc-usecase-notebooks
```

Open the URL provided in the console in a web browser. Usually, it is http://127.0.0.1:8888/?token=...

# Acknowledgements

- The Rapaio kernel is used to run the notebooks in a Jupyter environment. The Rapaio kernel is licensed under the MIT License. The source code is available at https://github.com/padreati/rapaio-jupyter-kernel 

- The MyBinder Dockerfile is based on the java-notebook Dockerfile available at https://github.com/jbindinga/java-notebook
